title: Web3 Indicator Entry with FIDLEG Extension

regulatoryExtensions.description: Modular regulatory extensions for different jurisdictions

fidleg.description: Swiss FIDLEG regulatory extension for DeFi protocol indicator states, focusing on triggered compliance actions.

fidlegTriggerEvent.description: The type of FIDLEG-relevant event triggered by this indicator reaching a specific state.

triggeredFidlegActions.description: A collection of specific, FIDLEG-mandated actions to be taken when this indicator is triggered or reaches a defined threshold.

fidlegMonitoringRationale.description: Justification for the chosen monitoring frequency and methodology in the context of FIDLEG due diligence (e.g., 'Real-time monitoring required to comply with Art. 24 for timely client information on significant changes and Art. 21 for adequate organisational measures.').

impactDescription.description: Specific FIDLEG/GwG implications of this suspicious pattern (e.g., 'Flash loan exploit implies immediate material change to product risk profile, triggering Art. 24 client notification and Art. 9/10 re-evaluation.').

patternTriggeredActions.description: Specific FIDLEG-mandated actions to be taken when this suspicious pattern is detected.

suspiciousPatternsFidlegImpacts.description: Identified suspicious patterns with their specific FIDLEG implications and triggered actions.
